name: Nat One Game
description:
Unity gave up on me, it might be because my laptop sucks but it just wouldn't let me test the game. I suck at coding but I was planning on doing the bare minimum like a menu and a highscore, but Unity just wouldn't let me test anything out today. So, I gave up and made it thematically appropriate with the GMTK 2022 Game Jams theme, Roll of the Dice, I rolled low in real life hence the game's title.

In the game you shoot a dice at randomly spawning enemies (Not sure if this works either, couldn't test it out) and depending on what you role a random shot will happen. You're enemies are smaller dices that roll around too, use your big dice to deflect and deal damage to kill the smaller dice.
